content: i made this giraffe for my daughter for christmas after i got tons of compliments and requests to make the for other people i figured maybe i had actually stumbled across a good pattern this is the very first pattern i wrote and is near and dear to me jojo is a shy little newborn giraffe who will steal your heart everyone who sees him will long for a jojo of their own he is just the right size for play or for a toddler to cuddle in bed - he stands about 12 tall pair him with the jojo blanket 1 for an excellent baby shower or toddler birthday gift he looks great made in many color combinations the jojo pattern has been tested by several independent testers to insure quality and clarity other materials needed 10mm screw-on eyes 12 in pipe cleaner fiberfill for stuffing **note this pattern is for the giraffe only this download does not include the jojo blanket pattern 1 ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/the-jojo-blanket
